item.title: Summary - Hurricane Jose (AT2/AL122017)
item.author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
item.description: ...TROPICAL STORM WARNING ISSUED FOR A PORTION OF SOUTHERN NEW ENGLAND... ...DANGEROUS SURF AND RIP CURRENTS EXPECTED ALONG THE EAST COAST OF THE UNITED STATES... As of 11:00 AM EDT Mon Sep 18 the center of Jose was located near 33.9, -71.1 with movement N at 9 mph. The minimum central pressure was 977 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 75 mph.

nhc:Cyclone.nhc:name: Jose
nhc:Cyclone.nhc:headline: ...TROPICAL STORM WARNING ISSUED FOR A PORTION OF SOUTHERN NEW ENGLAND... ...DANGEROUS SURF AND RIP CURRENTS EXPECTED ALONG THE EAST COAST OF THE UNITED STATES...

item.title: Summary - Tropical Depression Lee (AT4/AL142017)
item.author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
item.description: ...LEE HANGING ON AS A TROPICAL DEPRESSION... As of 11:00 AM AST Mon Sep 18 the center of Lee was located near 14.1, -40.6 with movement WNW at 14 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1007 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

nhc:Cyclone.nhc:name: Lee
nhc:Cyclone.nhc:headline: ...LEE HANGING ON AS A TROPICAL DEPRESSION...

item.title: Summary - Hurricane Maria (AT5/AL152017)
item.author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
item.description: ...MARIA RAPIDLY INTENSIFIES INTO A MAJOR HURRICANE... ...THE EYE IS EXPECTED TO MOVE THROUGH THE LEEWARD ISLANDS LATE THIS AFTERNOON OR THIS EVENING... As of 11:00 AM AST Mon Sep 18 the center of Maria was located near 14.7, -60.1 with movement WNW at 10 mph. The minimum central pressure was 959 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 120 mph.

nhc:Cyclone.nhc:name: Maria
